headline: Southern California Edison Announces Redemption of SCE Trust V 5.45% Fixed-to-Floating Rate Trust Preference Securities
summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif., February 10, 2026--Southern California Edison announced today that it will redeem all the outstanding shares of its Series K Preference Stock, which will cause SCE Trust V to redeem all of its outstanding 5.45% Fixed-to-Floating Rate Trust Preference Securities ("Trust Preference Securities"). The redemption date will be March 15, 2026, and the redemption price will be $25 per Trust Preference Security, plus accrued and unpaid distributions up to but excluding the redemption da

headline: Edison International Announces Redemption of 5.375% Fixed-Rate Reset Cumulative Perpetual Preferred Stock, Series A
summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif., February 10, 2026--Edison International announced today that it will redeem all the outstanding shares of its 5.375% Fixed-Rate Reset Cumulative Perpetual Preferred Stock, Series A ("Series A Preferred Stock"). The redemption date will be March 9, 2026, and the redemption price will be $1000 per share of Series A Preferred Stock.

headline: Duke Energy Q4 Earnings Lag Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y
summary: DUK's Q4 EPS misses estimates as higher costs weigh on results, even as revenues rise nearly 8% and electric sales volume increases.
